aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Cansu. I'm a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who is to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences. Let's shake hands with me.

items.description: Experienced in state management with Redux. Ability to manage complex application states.

items.description: Experienced in managing design processes with Figma and converting UI/UX designs to code.

items.title: Pizza
items.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This web builder and js interface is available as a NPM package and supports any kind of repository builder for code and theme purposes.
